name: Kidney Beans and Corn
author: Bethany Mulkern Colavito
summary: Kidney beans, corn, and red onion combine for a delicious dish that works well with rice or quinoa. This could also be served as a very hearty soup or chili.
ingredients: 1  green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1 (16 ounce) can kidney beans, with liquid
1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, with liquid
directions: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat, and cook garlic and onion until onion is tender
Stir in the green bell pepper, and cook until tender but firm
Season with cumin, mustard, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper
Stir the kidney beans with liquid and corn with liquid into the skillet
Bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium, and continue cooking 20 minutes, stirring occasionally
